feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prevent test container name conflicts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14282
  • Save autofields on bulksaves by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14280
  • Improve typings by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14281
  • Fix issue selecting the same file multiple times while importing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14284
  • Fix for HTTP 400 issue seen in Datadog logs by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14285
  • Record SQS queries in DataDog. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.26...2.29.27

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add helper function / builder for creating Automations for tests and improved types by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14220
  • Unify types by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14286
  • Trim couchdb fields while exporting rows by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14289
  • Handle _id when reimporting internal rows by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14290
  • Fix MS-SQL client timeout by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14296
  • Dont allow protected column names on import by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14294
  • Remove global node-fetch mock. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14297
  • Remove all mocking from rest.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14301
  • User column csv import error by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14302
  • SQL pagination improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14292
  • Fixing export rows to use correct search by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14305

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.27...2.29.28

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.29
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make sure to delete SSO ID doc as well by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14307
  • Fix Oracle support as a datasource and add tests for it. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14263

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.28...2.29.29

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update packages/server to use new larger runners. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14329
  • docs(README): reference link by @guspan-tanadi in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14311
  • Updating google-spreadsheet version by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14320
  • Add Oracle to datasource.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14325
  • Fix tables showing up multiple times for Oracle in the datasource info endpoint. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14328
  • Support primitives in feature flags, make flag types flow, remove some obsolete feature flag systems. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14216
  • Add detailed tracing to searches. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14333

New Contributors

  • @guspan-tanadi made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14311

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.29...2.29.30

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • In-memory support for logical operators by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14331
  • Add search filter api validation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14336
  • Support filtering views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14335
  • SQL support for logical operators in search by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14316
  • Follow-up to Oracle fix PR by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.30...2.30.0
